metadata.title: CVE-2020-6413 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Inappropriate implementation in Blink in Google Chrome prior to80.0.3987.87 allowed a remote attacker to bypass HTML validators via acrafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
